analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: and mind contact is not apprehended.🔽“The contact of the eye is not apprehended.🔽The contact of the ear is not apprehended.🔽The contact of the nose is not apprehended.🔽The contact of the tongue is not apprehended.🔽The contact of the body is not apprehended.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de @109a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de @109a *//

original: ni; mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: ni; mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The sensation that arises from the contact of the ear is not apprehended.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not the feeling that arises from the union of ear, contact, and attention.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of nose, contact, and attention is ungraspable.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not the feeling that arises from the union of nose, contact, and attention.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of tongue, contact, and attention is ungraspable.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not the feeling that arises from the union of tongue, contact, and attention.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of body, contact, and attention is ungraspable.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not the feeling that arises from the union of body, contact, and attention.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin /

original: sa'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sa'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: sa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams ma yin /

original: chu'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: chu'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams ma yin /

original: me'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: me'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The fire element, which is not apprehended,

original: me'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams ma yin /
translated: is not the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rlung gi khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The wind element, which is not apprehended,

original: rlung gi khams ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams ma yin /
translated: is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The space element, which is not apprehended,

original: nam mkha'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma yin /

original: @109b rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: @109b rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The consciousness element, which is not apprehended,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Ignorance, which is not apprehended,

original: ma rig pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma yin /
translated: is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Formations, which are not apprehended,

original: 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin /
translated: are not formations.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Consciousness is ungraspable.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin /🔽ming dang gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin / ming dang gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Consciousness that cannot be grasped is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ma yin /🔽skye mched drug yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma yin / skye mched drug yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Name and form that cannot be grasped are not name and form.

original: skye mched drug ma yin /🔽reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma yin / reg pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The six sense sources that cannot be grasped are not the six sense sources.

original: reg pa ma yin /🔽tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg pa ma yin / tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Contact that cannot be grasped is not contact.

original: tshor ba ma yin /🔽sred pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin / sred pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Sensation that cannot be grasped is not sensation.

original: sred pa ma yin /🔽len pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sred pa ma yin / len pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Craving that cannot be grasped is not craving.

original: len pa ma yin /🔽srid pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: len pa ma yin / srid pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Grasping that cannot be grasped is not grasping.

original: srid pa ma yin /🔽skye ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin / skye ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Becoming that cannot be grasped is not becoming.

original: skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba ma yin /
translated: Birth that cannot be grasped is not birth.

original: rga shi yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rga shi yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not fully grasped as aging and death🔽

original: rga shi ma yin /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rga shi ma yin / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Old age and death that are not apprehended are not old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of giving that is not apprehended is not the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs @110a *//🔽su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs @110a *// su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of morality that is not apprehended is not the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of patience that is not apprehended is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of effort that is not apprehended is not the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of meditation that is not apprehended is not the perfection of meditation.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is not apprehended.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni / nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of external phenomena is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is not apprehended.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni / phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of great extent is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of all things is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin //
translated: The emptiness of other things is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of non-existence is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of non-entities is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The unconditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The conditioned elements of perception are not apprehended.🔽The unconditioned elements

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The ultimate, emptiness, which is not apprehended,🔽

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The ultimate emptiness that cannot be apprehended is not the ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas @110b stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas @110b stong pa nyid ma yin / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The emptiness of what is limitless that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of what is limitless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of nature is not something to be grasped.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of nature that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of its own mark that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of non-things that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entity is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities that cannot be apprehended is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The applications of mindfulness that cannot be apprehended are not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams @111a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams @111a *//
translated: The right efforts that cannot be apprehended are not the right efforts.🔽The legs of manifestation that cannot be apprehended are not the legs of manifestation.🔽The faculties that cannot be apprehended are not the faculties.🔽The powers that cannot be apprehended are not the powers.🔽The branches of enlightenment that cannot be apprehended are not the branches of enlightenment.

original: yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The path that cannot be apprehended is not the path.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The concentrations that cannot be apprehended are not the concentrations.🔽The immeasurables that cannot be apprehended are not the immeasurables.🔽The formless absorptions that cannot be apprehended are not the formless absorptions.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The perfections that cannot be apprehended are not the perfections.

original: dbang po rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dbang po rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emptinesses that cannot be apprehended are not the emptinesses.🔽The doors of liberation that cannot be apprehended are not the doors of liberation.

original: dbang po rnams ma yin /
analyzed: dbang po rnams ma yin /
translated: The powers that cannot be apprehended are not the powers.🔽The fearlessnesses that cannot be apprehended are not the fearlessnesses.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges that cannot be apprehended are not the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽The correct and discerning awarenesses that cannot be apprehended are not the correct and discerning awarenesses.🔽The aspects of liberation that cannot be apprehended are not the aspects of liberation.🔽The totalities that cannot be apprehended are not the totalities.🔽The grounds of totality that cannot be apprehended are not the grounds of totality.

original: stobs rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The meditative stabilization that cannot be apprehended is not the meditative stabilization.

original: stobs rnams ma yin /
analyzed: stobs rnams ma yin /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways that cannot be apprehended are not the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The Buddhadharmas that cannot be apprehended are not the Buddhadharmas.🔽The knowledge of all aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of path aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of path aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects that cannot be apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva levels are not apprehended.🔽

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The limbs of awakening are not apprehended as the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The noble eightfold path is not apprehended as the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /🔽bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin / bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The noble truths are not apprehended as the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams ma yin /🔽tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma yin / tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The dhyānas are not apprehended as the dhyānas.

original: tshad med pa rnams ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma yin / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurable aspirations are not apprehended as the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The formless absorptions are not apprehended as the formless absorptions.🔽The emptiness gate of liberation is not apprehended as the emptiness gate of liberation.🔽The signless gate of liberation is not apprehended as the signless gate of liberation.🔽The wishless gate of liberation is not apprehended as the wishless gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The complete liberations are ungraspable.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @111b par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @111b par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The emancipations that are not apprehended are not the emancipations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /🔽rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The meditative stabilizations that are not apprehended are not the meditative stabilizations.🔽The doors of liberation that are not apprehended are not the doors of liberation.🔽The formless absorptions that are not apprehended are not the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are not apprehended are not emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The applications of mindfulness that are not apprehended are not the applications of mindfulness.🔽The correct exertions that are not apprehended are not the correct exertions.🔽The supports for miraculous abilities that are not apprehended are not the supports for miraculous abilities.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The faculties that are not apprehended are not the faculties.🔽The powers that are not apprehended are not the powers.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /
translated: The branches of enlightenment that are not apprehended are not the branches of enlightenment.🔽The path that is not apprehended is not the path.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not apprehensible.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas are not apprehensible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not apprehensible.🔽The fearlessnesses are not apprehensible.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The fearlessnesses are not apprehensible.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are not apprehensible.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin /🔽byams pa chen po yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin / byams pa chen po yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are not apprehensible.🔽Great love is not apprehensible.

original: byams pa chen po ma yin /🔽snying rje chen po yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byams pa chen po ma yin / snying rje chen po yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Great love is not apprehensible.🔽Great compassion is not apprehensible.

original: snying rje chen po ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma yin /
translated: Great compassion is not apprehensible.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehensible.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos @112a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos @112a *//
translated: the qualities of buddhahood,🔽

original: ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are not,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the result of stream enterer that is not apprehended is not the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the result of once-returner that is not apprehended is not the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the result of non-returner that is not apprehended is not the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin /🔽rang byang chub yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin / rang byang chub yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the state of a worthy one that is not apprehended is not the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub ma yin /🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang byang chub ma yin / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening that is not apprehended is not a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects that is not apprehended is not the knowledge of path aspects,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects that is not apprehended is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The retention of omniscience is not retention.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is the non-apprehension of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
translated: When this stage of the bodhisattva was being taught,

original: byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
translated: two thousand bodhisattvas attained the forbearance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u sum cu brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u sum cu brgyad pa'o ////
translated: Chapter Thirty-Eight.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @112b sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa ni gang lags /🔽tshul ni gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @112b sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa ni gang lags / tshul ni gang lags /
translated: “Lord,🔽what are the aspects,🔽what is the mode,

original: mtshan ma ni gang lags /
analyzed: mtshan ma ni gang lags /
translated: what are the signs of an irreversible bodhisattva great being?

original: ji ltar bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi /
translated: How can we know that this bodhisattva mahāsattva is irreversible?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Lord having been asked this, he said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar bshad pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar bshad pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med cing /
translated: “Subhūti, here, the level of the ordinary person, the śrāvaka level, the pratyekabuddha level, the bodhisattva level, and the level of the tathāgata that have been explained are all the same in suchness, without change,

original: rnam par rtog pa med la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: without conceptualization, nondual, and indivisible.

original: de ni de bzhin nyid de ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin nyid de ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
translated: That suchness is entered into just as it is.

original: de bzhin nyid la rnam par mi rtog cing /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la rnam par mi rtog cing /
translated: Suchness is without conceptualization.

original: de ltar rnam par mi rtog par 'jug ste /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par mi rtog par 'jug ste /
translated: One enters into it without conceptualization.

original: de ltar zhugs pa ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thos nas de las 'das te /
analyzed: de ltar zhugs pa ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thos nas de las 'das te /
translated: One who has entered like this, having heard the suchness just as it is, has gone beyond it.

original: de dag de bzhin nyid la re re dang / gnyis ka dang / gnyis ka ma yin par the tsom zab gang yang med do //
analyzed: de dag de bzhin nyid la re re dang / gnyis ka dang / gnyis ka ma yin par the tsom zab gang yang med do //
translated: In that suchness, there is no doubt whatsoever, whether it is one, both, or neither.

original: de ni byung rgyal du smra ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni byung rgyal du smra ba ma yin te /
translated: This is not random speech.

original: don dang ldan par smra'i /
analyzed: don dang ldan par smra'i /
translated: One speaks with meaning,

original: don dang mi ldan par smra ba ma yin /
analyzed: don dang mi ldan par smra ba ma yin /
translated: not without meaning.

original: gzhan gyis byas pa dang ma byas pa la mi lta zhing legs par brjod pa tshol ba yin to /🔽rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @113a *//
analyzed: gzhan gyis byas pa dang ma byas pa la mi lta zhing legs par brjod pa tshol ba yin to / rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @113a *//
translated: One does not look to others for what has been done or not done, but seeks out what has been well spoken.

original: chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being who has those aspects, that orientation, and those marks should be known as irreversible.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: rnam pa gang dag dang / tshul gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dag dang / tshul gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi /
translated: “What are the aspects, what are the modes, and what are the signs of irreversible bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni rnam pa med pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni rnam pa med pa /
translated: “Subhūti, all dharmas are without aspects,

original: tshul med pa /
analyzed: tshul med pa /
translated: without modes,

original: mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: and without signs.”🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te chos thams cad rnam pa ma mchis pa /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad rnam pa ma mchis pa /
translated: if all dharmas are without aspects,

original: tshul ma mchis pa /
analyzed: tshul ma mchis pa /
translated: without modes,

original: mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags na /🔽chos gang rnams las slar ldog pa'i slad du /
analyzed: mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags na / chos gang rnams las slar ldog pa'i slad du /
translated: and without signs,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: from which dharmas do bodhisattva great beings turn back

original: phyir mi ldog pa zhes bstan pa lags /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa zhes bstan pa lags /
translated: so that they are called ‘irreversible’?🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs las phyir log pa /🔽tshor ba las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs las phyir log pa / tshor ba las phyir log pa /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who turn back from form,🔽who turn back from feeling,

original: 'du shes las phyir log pa /
analyzed: 'du shes las phyir log pa /
translated: who turn back from perception,

original: 'du byed las phyir log pa /
analyzed: 'du byed las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from volitional formations.

original: rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /🔽mig las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa / mig las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from consciousness.🔽It is to turn away from the eyes.

original: rna ba las phyir log pa /🔽sna las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rna ba las phyir log pa / sna las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from the ears.🔽It is to turn away from the nose.

original: lce las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lce las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from the tongue.

original: lus las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lus las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from the body.

original: yid las phyir log pa /🔽gzugs las phyir log pa /
analyzed: yid las phyir log pa / gzugs las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from the mental faculty.🔽It is to turn away from sights.

original: sgra las phyir log pa /🔽dri las phyir log pa /🔽ro las phyir log pa /
analyzed: sgra las phyir log pa / dri las phyir log pa / ro las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from sounds.🔽It is to turn away from smells.🔽It is to turn away from tastes.

original: reg las phyir log pa /
analyzed: reg las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from tangibles.

original: chos @113b las phyir log pa /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: chos @113b las phyir log pa / mig gi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from mental phenomena.🔽It is to turn away from eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa / sna'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from ear consciousness.🔽It is to turn away from nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from mind consciousness.🔽It is to turn away from eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is to turn away from ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the union of nose and contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the union of tongue and contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the union of body and contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the union of mind and contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the condition of contact through the union of eye and form.🔽It is the reversal of the condition of contact through the union of ear and sound.🔽It is the reversal of the condition of contact through the union of nose and smell.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the condition of contact through the union of tongue and taste.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the condition of contact through the union of body and touch.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the condition of contact through the union of mind and phenomena.

original: sa'i khams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: sa'i khams las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: chu'i khams las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the water element.

original: me'i khams las phyir log pa /🔽rlung gi khams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: me'i khams las phyir log pa / rlung gi khams las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the fire element.🔽It is the reversal of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the reversal of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the element of consciousness.

original: ma rig pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of ignorance.

original: 'du byed las phyir log pa /
analyzed: 'du byed las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of formation.

original: rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of consciousness.

original: ming @114a *// dang gzugs las phyir log pa /
analyzed: ming @114a *// dang gzugs las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of name and form.

original: skye mched drug las phyir log pa /
analyzed: skye mched drug las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: reg pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of contact.

original: tshor ba las phyir log pa /🔽sred pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: tshor ba las phyir log pa / sred pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of feeling.🔽It is the opposite of craving.

original: len pa las phyir log pa /🔽srid pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: len pa las phyir log pa / srid pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of grasping.🔽It is the opposite of becoming.

original: skye ba las phyir log pa /
analyzed: skye ba las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of birth.

original: rga shi las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rga shi las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the perfection of discipline.🔽It is the opposite of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa /
translated: It is the opposite of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las phyir log pa / phyi nang stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from outer emptiness.🔽They turn away from inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /🔽chen po stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa / chen po stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They turn away from great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa / 'dus byas stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from ultimate emptiness.🔽They turn away from conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las phyir log pa / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from unconditioned emptiness.🔽They turn away from the emptiness of what is beyond limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /🔽dar ba med pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa / dar ba med pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽They turn away from the emptiness of not being abandoned.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They turn away from the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log @114b pa; mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log @114b pa; mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: They turn away from the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽they turn away from the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las phyir log pa /🔽dbang po rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las phyir log pa / dbang po rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the legs of miraculous power,🔽they turn away from the faculties,

original: stobs rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: stobs rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the branches of enlightenment,🔽they turn away from the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las phyir log pa; 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las phyir log pa; 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams las phyir log pa /🔽tshad med pa rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las phyir log pa / tshad med pa rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the meditative stabilities,🔽they turn away from the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu las phyir log pa /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the nine serial absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the clairvoyances;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the meditative stabilizations;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las phyir log pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las phyir log pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the ten tathāgata powers;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi las phyir log pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las phyir log pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: byams pa chen po @115a *//🔽las phyir log pa /
analyzed: byams pa chen po @115a *// las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from great love;

original: snying rje chen po las phyir log pa /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las phyir log pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir log pa /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las phyir log pa /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las phyir log pa /
translated: they turn away from the knowledge of path aspects;

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir log pa de ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir log pa de ni /
translated: and they turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that those bodhisattva great beings are irreversible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of form in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is nonexistent;🔽the intrinsic nature of feeling in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is nonexistent;🔽the intrinsic nature of perception in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is nonexistent;

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the intrinsic nature of volitional factors in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is nonexistent;

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of consciousness in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna @115b ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna @115b ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of eyes in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.🔽There is no intrinsic nature of ears in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.🔽There is no intrinsic nature of a nose in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of a tongue in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of a body in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of a mind in which a bodhisattva great being could stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med do; ;gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med do; ;gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of form in which the bodhisattva great being should stand. There is no intrinsic nature of sound in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dri'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ro'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dri'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ro'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of smell in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.🔽There is no intrinsic nature of taste in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i reg gi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i reg gi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of touch in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of mental objects in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the eye consciousness in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna @116a *//
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna @116a *//
translated: the nature of the ear consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the nose consciousness is non-apprehensible.🔽The nature of the tongue consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the body consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The nature of the thinking consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the eye sense-field is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the ear sense-field is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the nose sense-field is non-apprehensible,

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: and the nature of the tongue sense-field is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the body sense-field is non-apprehensible,

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: and the nature of the thinking-mind sense-field is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the eye faculty is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the ear faculty is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the nose faculty is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the tongue faculty is non-apprehensible,

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: and the nature of the body faculty is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the thinking-mind faculty is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the female constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the male constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the life constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the feeling constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the perception constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the volitions constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the consciousness constituent is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of form is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of sound is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of smell is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of taste is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of tangibles is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of mental phenomena is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of visual consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of auditory consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of olfactory consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the constituent of gustatory consciousness is non-apprehensible,🔽and the nature of the

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the entity of the sensory element of the ears in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the entity of the sensory element of the nose in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the entity of the sensory element of the tongue in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the entity of the sensory element of the body in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas @116b par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas @116b par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the entity of the sensory element of the thinking mind in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //

translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the entity of the sensory element of the eye’s contact condition that is the cause of feeling in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear.🔽There is no intrinsic nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the thinking-mind.

analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the water element in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems @117a *// dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the fire element in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.🔽There is no intrinsic nature of the wind element in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the space element in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the consciousness element in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the compositional factors in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of consciousness in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of name and form in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature of the six sense spheres in which the bodhisattva great being comes to rest.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i reg pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality in contact in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality in feeling in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sred pa'i ngo bo nyid @117b med do //
translated: There is no reality in craving in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i len pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality in grasping in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i srid pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i srid pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
