original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality in birth in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rga shi'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rga shi'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality in old age and death in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do /
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do /
translated: There is no reality to the perfection of generosity in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality to the perfection of morality in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality to the perfection of patience in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality to the perfection of effort in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality to the perfection of meditation in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' @118a *//🔽sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' @118a *// sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom in which the bodhisattva great being should stand does not exist.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of internal phenomena in which the bodhisattva great being should stand does not exist.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of external phenomena in which the bodhisattva great being should stand does not exist.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena in which the bodhisattva great being should stand does not exist.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of emptiness in which the bodhisattva great being should stand does not exist.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of the great is not the emptiness of the great.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is not the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of anything is nonexistent, in which bodhisattva great beings would stand.

original: gang @118b la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang @118b la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is nonexistent, in which bodhisattva great beings would stand.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of anything is nonexistent, in which bodhisattva great beings would stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas phar  'gyur ba'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas phar  'gyur ba'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is nonexistent, in which bodhisattva great beings would stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of all things is nonexistent, in which bodhisattva great beings would stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of its own mark is nonexistent, in which bodhisattva great beings would stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension has no intrinsic nature in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.🔽The emptiness of non-entities has no intrinsic nature in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature has no intrinsic nature in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of the non-apprehension of entities has no intrinsic nature in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness have no intrinsic nature in which the bodhisattva great being should stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la @119a *//🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la @119a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The real nature of the four right efforts in which bodhisattva great beings should train is non-existent.🔽The real nature of the four legs of miraculous power in which bodhisattva great beings should train is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The real nature of the five faculties in which bodhisattva great beings should train is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The real nature of the five powers in which bodhisattva great beings should train is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The real nature of the seven parts of awakening in which bodhisattva great beings should train is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the five faculties in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the five powers in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the seven limbs of awakening in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the noble eightfold path in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur pa'i bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur pa'i bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the four noble truths in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the four formless absorptions in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the four formless absorptions in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the five faculties in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the five powers in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the seven limbs of awakening in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the noble eightfold path in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the four noble truths in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the four formless absorptions in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no intrinsic nature in the four formless absorptions in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the five faculties in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the five powers in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the seven limbs of awakening in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the noble eightfold path in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the four noble truths in which the bodhisattva great beings should train.🔽There is no intrinsic nature in the four formless absorptions in which the bod

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par @119b 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par @119b 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The eight liberations have no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The nine serial steps of meditative absorption have no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Emptiness has no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Signlessness has no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.🔽Wishlessness has no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.🔽The ten powers have no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.🔽The four fearlessnesses have no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid med do; ;gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid med do; ;gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge have no intrinsic nature in which a bodhisattva great being might stand.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The essence of the meditative stabilities in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do /
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med do /
translated: The essence of the dhāraṇī gateways in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The essence of the ten powers of the tathāgatas in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i so so yang @120a *//
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i so so yang @120a *//
translated: The essence of the four fearlessnesses in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is non-existent.

original: dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The essence of the four detailed and thorough knowledges in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The essence of the great love in which bodhisattva great beings would stand is non-existent.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality of the great compassion in which the bodhisattva great being stands.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid med do // gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha in which the bodhisattva great being stands.🔽There is no reality of the fruit of stream-enterer in which the bodhisattva great being stands.🔽There is no reality of the fruit of once-returner in which the bodhisattva great being stands.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: There is no reality of the fruit of non-returner in which the bodhisattva great being stands.

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the reality of the arhat is not something on which the bodhisattva great being stands;

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the reality of the pratyekabuddha is not something on which the bodhisattva great being stands;

original: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the reality of the knowledge of path aspects is not something on which the bodhisattva great being stands;

original: gang la byang chub @120b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gang la byang chub @120b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the reality of the knowledge of all aspects is not something on which the bodhisattva great being stands.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings

original: dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ni shes par bya ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ni shes par bya ba shes pa'o //
translated: know what is to be known by these ascetics and brahmins;

original: blta bar bya ba mthong ba'o //
analyzed: blta bar bya ba mthong ba'o //
translated: they see what is to be seen;

original: yang dag par lta ba 'dogs pa 'dogs so zhes 'di las phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze gzhan dag gi ngor mi lta ste /
analyzed: yang dag par lta ba 'dogs pa 'dogs so zhes 'di las phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze gzhan dag gi ngor mi lta ste /
translated: He does not look to the faces of other ascetics or brahmins, thinking, ‘This one is a true ascetic or brahmin, or this one is teaching the true doctrine, or this one is teaching what is correct.’

original: de ni gnas med cing the tshom mi za'o //
analyzed: de ni gnas med cing the tshom mi za'o //
translated: He does not doubt or wonder about anything.

original: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mi snyems /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mi snyems /
translated: He does not value moral discipline and ascetic practices.

original: lta ba ngan par mi ltung /
analyzed: lta ba ngan par mi ltung /
translated: He does not fall into bad views.

original: bkra shis dang ltas kyis gtsang mar mi 'dogs te /
analyzed: bkra shis dang ltas kyis gtsang mar mi 'dogs te /
translated: He does not consider himself pure because of auspicious signs or omens.

original: lha gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal zhing /🔽me tog gam /
analyzed: lha gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal zhing / me tog gam /
translated: He does not bow down to other gods.🔽He does not think of giving flowers,

original: phreng ba'am / spos sam /
analyzed: phreng ba'am / spos sam /
translated: garlands,🔽incense,🔽ointments,

original: byug pa'am / phye ma'am /
analyzed: byug pa'am / phye ma'am /
translated: powders,🔽clothing,

original: gos sam / gdugs sam /
analyzed: gos sam / gdugs sam /
translated: parasols,

original: rgyal mtshan nam /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan nam /
translated: flags,

original: ba dan dag de la sbyin cing /
analyzed: ba dan dag de la sbyin cing /
translated: or banners to them.

original: bya bar mi sems te /
analyzed: bya bar mi sems te /
translated: He does not think of doing anything for them.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those aspects, that orientation, and those signs are irreversible.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the irreversible Bodhisattva Mahāsattva

original: sems can dmyal bar mi skye /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar mi skye /
translated: is not born in the hells,

original: byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye /
translated: is not born in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye /
translated: is not born in the world of Yama,

original: lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye /
analyzed: lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye /
translated: is not born among the long-lived gods,

original: gang na skye bo glan zhing lkug pa dge ba'i chos mi spyod pa'i nang du mi skye /🔽yul mtha' 'khob @121a *//
analyzed: gang na skye bo glan zhing lkug pa dge ba'i chos mi spyod pa'i nang du mi skye / yul mtha' 'khob @121a *//
translated: is not born among those who are mute, dumb, and do not practice virtuous dharmas,🔽is not born among the savage border peoples,

original: kyi skye bo ma rungs pa dang / kla klo'i nang du mi skye /
analyzed: kyi skye bo ma rungs pa dang / kla klo'i nang du mi skye /
translated: is not born among the barbarians,

original: log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye /
analyzed: log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye /
translated: is not born in a family with wrong views,

original: gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der mi skye ste /
analyzed: gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der mi skye ste /
translated: and is not born where the sound of the Buddha, the sound of the Dharma, and the sound of the Saṅgha are not heard.

original: de ltar mi khom pa brgyad po 'di dag gi nang du mi skye zhing /
analyzed: de ltar mi khom pa brgyad po 'di dag gi nang du mi skye zhing /
translated: Thus, he is not born among these eight unfavorable conditions,

original: bud med du 'gyur ba yongs su mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: bud med du 'gyur ba yongs su mi 'dzin te /
translated: and does not take on the state of being a woman.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahasattva who has these aspects, this nature, and these characteristics is a Bodhisattva-mahasattva who has attained the irreversible ground.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung zhing spyod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung zhing spyod de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhuti, an irreversible Bodhisattva-mahasattva upholds and practices the ten wholesome ways of action.

original: bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs shing /
translated: He himself abandons killing,

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: encourages others to abandon killing,

original: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /🔽gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin / gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
translated: praises the abandonment of killing,🔽and is pleased with the abandonment of killing.

original: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs shing /
translated: He himself abandons stealing,

original: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: encourages others to abandon stealing,

original: ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I praise the avoidance of taking what is not given.

original: gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
translated: I praise those who avoid taking what is not given.

original: bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs shing /
translated: I myself avoid sexual misconduct.

original: gzhan yang 'dod @121b pas log par g-yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /🔽'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod @121b pas log par g-yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I encourage others to avoid sexual misconduct.🔽I praise the avoidance of sexual misconduct.

original: gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
translated: I praise those who avoid sexual misconduct.

original: bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs shing /
translated: I myself avoid lying.

original: gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to avoid lying.

original: brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I praise the avoidance of lying.

original: gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
translated: and I will praise others who have given up lying and rejoice in their achievement.

original: bdag gis kyang phra ma spangs shing; gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /🔽phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phra ma spangs shing; gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin / phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: “I will give up slander and encourage others to give it up.

original: gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /🔽bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spangs shing /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin / bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spangs shing /
translated: I will praise the avoidance of slander and rejoice in the avoidance of slander by others.

original: gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /🔽zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin / zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will give up harsh speech and encourage others to give it up.

original: gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /🔽bdag gis kyang tshig bkyal ba smra ba spangs shing /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin / bdag gis kyang tshig bkyal ba smra ba spangs shing /
translated: I will praise the avoidance of harsh speech and rejoice in the avoidance of harsh speech by others.🔽I will give up idle talk and encourage others to give it up.

original: gzhan yang tshig bkyal ba smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshig bkyal ba smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I will praise the avoidance of idle talk and rejoice in the avoidance of idle talk by others.

original: tshig bkyal pa smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /🔽gzhan gang gis tshig bkyal ba smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun @122a *//
analyzed: tshig bkyal pa smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin / gzhan gang gis tshig bkyal ba smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun @122a *//
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up idle speech.

original: pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: pas dga' ba yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who give up idle speech and will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs shing /
translated: I will give up covetousness

original: gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /🔽chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin / chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: and will encourage others to give up covetousness.

original: gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up covetousness and will rejoice in those who give it up.

original: bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs shing /
translated: I will give up malice

original: gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /🔽gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin / gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: and will encourage others to give up malice.

original: gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up malice and will rejoice in those who give it up.

original: bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs shing /
translated: I will give up wrong views🔽and will encourage others to give up wrong views.

original: gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: Moreover, they encourage others to give up wrong views,

original: log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: they speak in praise of giving up wrong views,

original: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin te /
translated: and they speak in praise of others giving up wrong views as well, welcoming it.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang; tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang; tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those aspects, who have those signs, who have those marks are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rmi lam na'ang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rmi lam na'ang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi dmigs na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible do not apprehend the ten unwholesome actions even in a dream,

original: sad pa na lta ci smos te /
analyzed: sad pa na lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone when they are awake.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag @122b dang; mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag @122b dang; mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those aspects, who have those signs, who have those marks are irreversible.”🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible do not have the five obscurations. What are the five? They are the obscuration of desire, the obscuration of anger, the obscuration of dullness, the obscuration of pride, and the obscuration of doubt.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the irreversible Bodhisattva, the great being

original: nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: when he is established in the perfection of giving,

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: he gives that gift for the sake of all beings.

original: nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he is established in the perfection of morality,

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir tshul khrims de srung bar byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir tshul khrims de srung bar byed do //
translated: he guards that morality for the sake of all beings.

original: nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he is established in the perfection of patience,

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir bzod pa de sgom par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir bzod pa de sgom par byed do //
translated: he cultivates that patience for the sake of all beings.

original: nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he is established in the perfection of effort,

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir brtson 'grus de rtsom par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir brtson 'grus de rtsom par byed do //
translated: he makes that effort for the sake of all beings.

original: nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he is established in the perfection of meditation,

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir bsam gtan de la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir bsam gtan de la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: He enters into the meditative stabilization for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he stands in the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir shes rab de sgom par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir shes rab de sgom par byed do //
translated: he cultivates that wisdom for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those modes, that sort of form, and those attributes are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / @123a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / @123a *//
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings do not get up from their seats when a discourse, a verse,

original: lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
analyzed: lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
translated: a proclamation, a line, a recitation, a brief discussion, a story, a former existence, an extensive teaching, a marvel, or an exposition is being taught, and do not go to listen to it.

original: gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i chos de dag chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i don du kun chub par byas nas /
analyzed: gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i chos de dag chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i don du kun chub par byas nas /
translated: Having mastered those dharmas that are taught for the sake of the gift of the Dharma,

original: de chos kyi sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
analyzed: de chos kyi sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
translated: when he gives that gift of the Dharma,

original: 'di snyam du chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bsams nas /
analyzed: 'di snyam du chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bsams nas /
translated: he thinks, ‘By this gift of the Dharma may the wishes of all sentient beings be fulfilled!’

original: des chos kyi sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
analyzed: des chos kyi sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
translated: Having made that gift of the Dharma into something shared in common by all sentient beings,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo ste /
translated: he dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings endowed with those aspects, those signs, and those marks

original: phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o ////
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o ////
translated: should be known as irreversible.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya so drug pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya so drug pa //
translated: fascicle two hundred and thirty-six

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos zab mo la nem nur med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos zab mo la nem nur med /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings have no doubts,

original: the tshom med /
analyzed: the tshom med /
translated: no uncertainty,

original: yid gnyis med do //
analyzed: yid gnyis med do //
translated: and no hesitation about the profound Dharma.

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /🔽ci'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das / ci'i slad du /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /🔽chos zab mo la nem nur ma mchis /🔽the tshom ma mchis /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / chos zab mo la nem nur ma mchis / the tshom ma mchis /
translated: why is it that irreversible bodhisattva great beings🔽have no doubts,🔽no uncertainty,

original: yid gnyis ma @123b mchis pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: yid gnyis ma @123b mchis pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and no hesitation about the profound Dharma?”

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de /🔽gang la nem nur ram /🔽yid gnyis sam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de / gang la nem nur ram / yid gnyis sam /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti, it is because irreversible bodhisattva great beings do not see any phenomenon at all.

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: and he does not see unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / rnams pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnams pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings endowed with those aspects, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings

original: lus kyi las 'jam pa @125a *//🔽dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: lus kyi las 'jam pa @125a *// dang ldan pa yin /
translated: have a gentle physical action,

original: ngag gi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: ngag gi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: have a gentle verbal action,

original: yid kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: and have a gentle mental action.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings endowed with those aspects, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.”🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings do not have a mean physical action,🔽do not have a mean verbal action,🔽and do not have a mean mental action.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being who is irreversible is endowed with the physical action of love,

original: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin /
translated: is endowed with the verbal action of love,

original: byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: and is endowed with the mental action of love.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o; ;rab 'byor /🔽gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o; ;rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being who has those aspects, that manner, and those signs should be known as irreversible.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being who is irreversible🔽does not abide together with these five obscurations:🔽longing for sense objects,🔽malice,🔽sloth and torpor,

original: 'dod pa la mos pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang; gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tshom gyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te /
analyzed: 'dod pa la mos pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang; gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tshom gyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te /
translated: excitement and regret,🔽and doubt.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has these aspects, characteristics, and signs is a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @125b sems dpa' chen po la ni /🔽bag la nyal ba thams cad du thams cad med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @125b sems dpa' chen po la ni / bag la nyal ba thams cad du thams cad med de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who is irreversible does not have any latent tendencies.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has these aspects, characteristics, and signs is a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro zhing 'ong yang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro zhing 'ong yang /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, an irreversible Bodhisattva-mahāsattva, when going or coming,

original: nor ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro /
analyzed: nor ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro /
translated: does not go with a confused mind.

original: nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'ong ste /
analyzed: nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'ong ste /
translated: He does not come with a confused mind.

original: de 'gro 'am 'ong na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro /
analyzed: de 'gro 'am 'ong na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro /
translated: When he goes or comes, he goes with mindfulness established.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'ong ste /🔽de dran bzhin du 'gro /🔽dran bzhin du 'ong /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'ong ste / de dran bzhin du 'gro / dran bzhin du 'ong /
translated: He comes to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.🔽He goes to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.🔽He comes to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.

original: dran bzhin du 'chag /🔽dran bzhin du sdod /🔽dran bzhin du 'dug /
analyzed: dran bzhin du 'chag / dran bzhin du sdod / dran bzhin du 'dug /
translated: He walks to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.🔽He stands to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.🔽He sits to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.

original: dran bzhin du nyal te /🔽de 'phral la sa las rkang pa mi 'deg /
analyzed: dran bzhin du nyal te / de 'phral la sa las rkang pa mi 'deg /
translated: He lies down to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.🔽He does not lift his foot from the ground suddenly.

original: 'phral la sa la rkang pa mi 'jog ste /🔽dran bzhin du rkang pa 'deg /
analyzed: 'phral la sa la rkang pa mi 'jog ste / dran bzhin du rkang pa 'deg /
translated: He does not put his foot down on the ground suddenly.🔽He lifts his foot to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.

original: dran bzhin du rkang pa 'jog cing /
analyzed: dran bzhin du rkang pa 'jog cing /
translated: He puts his foot down to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.

original: de sa'i phyogs mthong bzhin du 'gro ste /
analyzed: de sa'i phyogs mthong bzhin du 'gro ste /
translated: He goes seeing the ground in front of him to mindfully establish the foundations of mindfulness.🔽Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings endowed with those attributes, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gos kyi tshags la smad du med pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gos kyi tshags la smad du med pa yin /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings are not criticized for their dress.

original: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan te /🔽gtsang zhing dri nga ba med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan te / gtsang zhing dri nga ba med la /
translated: Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings have pure conduct.🔽They are clean and do not smell bad.

original: rdul dang dri ma dang bral @126a *//
analyzed: rdul dang dri ma dang bral @126a *//
translated: They are free from dirt and stains.

original: zhing nad nyung ba yin te /
analyzed: zhing nad nyung ba yin te /
translated: They have few illnesses.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those modes, and those signs

original: phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang mir gyur pa rnams kyi lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus de nyid la za ba yod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang mir gyur pa rnams kyi lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus de nyid la za ba yod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du
translated: are irreversible.

original: thams cad med do //
analyzed: thams cad med do //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the eighty-four thousand types of worms in the bodies of human beings that eat that body are completely and totally absent in the bodies of irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
translated: Subhūti, it is because those wholesome roots of the bodhisattva great beings are superior to the whole world,

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: and become the best in the whole world.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po po'i lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po de dag med de /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po po'i lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po de dag med de /
translated: Therefore, those eighty-four thousand types of worms in the body of the bodhisattva great beings do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: Subhūti, to the extent that those wholesome roots of the bodhisattva great beings increase, to that extent the bodhisattva great beings take up a purified body,

original: ngag yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: ngag yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take up a purified speech,

original: sems yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: and take up a purified mind.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang @126b ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang @126b ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who possesses these aspects, characteristics, and signs is a non-regressing Bodhisattva.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this was said, the Venerable Subhuti addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: World-Honored One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: how is the body of a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva pure?

original: ngag yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ngag yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is his speech pure?

original: sems yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: sems yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is his mind pure?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Buddha said:

original: rab 'byor / ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis lus dang / ngag dang / sems mi drang ba dang / lus dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis lus dang / ngag dang / sems mi drang ba dang / lus dang /
translated: Subhuti, as the roots of goodness of a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva increase, to that extent his body, speech, and mind become straight, and his body, speech, and mind become pure.

original: ngag dang sems kyi gya gyu yongs su byang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ngag dang sems kyi gya gyu yongs su byang bar 'gyur te /
translated: and the crookedness of speech and mind is completely purified.

original: de'ang de lta de ltar lus kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod do //
analyzed: de'ang de lta de ltar lus kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod do //
translated: And in that way, he practices the three kinds of good conduct with the body,

original: ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnam pa bzhi spyod do //
analyzed: ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnam pa bzhi spyod do //
translated: he practices the four kinds of good conduct with speech,

original: yid kyis legs par spyod pa rnam pa gsum spyod de /
analyzed: yid kyis legs par spyod pa rnam pa gsum spyod de /
translated: and he practices the three kinds of good conduct with the mind.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ purity of body, speech, and mind.

original: de lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa des /
analyzed: de lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa des /
translated: With that purity of body, speech, and mind,

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed de /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed de /
translated: they transcend the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels, but do not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: rab 'byor / 'di 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs @127a *//🔽su dag par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs @127a *//🔽su dag par rig par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this too is the bodhisattva great beings’ purity of body, speech, and mind.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahasattva who has these attributes, this type of Dharma, and these signs is a Bodhisattva-mahasattva who has attained the acceptance that phenomena are not produced.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahasattva who has attained the acceptance that phenomena are not produced does not pursue gain, respect, or praise.

original: bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue alms.

original: phyag dar khrod pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyag dar khrod pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue rags from the refuse heap.

original: stan gcig pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: stan gcig pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue a single sitting.

original: bsod snyoms phyis mi len pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsod snyoms phyis mi len pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue not eating after midday.

original: ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue whatever alms he receives.

original: dgon pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: dgon pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue the wilderness.

original: shing drung lhur len pa ma yin /🔽bla gab med pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: shing drung lhur len pa ma yin / bla gab med pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue the foot of a tree.🔽He does not pursue an open and exposed place.

original: dur khrod lhur len pa ma yin /🔽cog pu lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: dur khrod lhur len pa ma yin / cog pu lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue a charnel ground.🔽He does not pursue sitting on a grass mat.

original: gnas ji bzhin lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: gnas ji bzhin lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: He does not pursue whatever dwelling he receives.

original: chos gos gsum pa lhur len pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: chos gos gsum pa lhur len pa ma yin zhing /
translated: and he does not make a show of wearing the three Dharma robes.

original: de sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyang yang dag par blangs te spyod do //
analyzed: de sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyang yang dag par blangs te spyod do //
translated: He takes up and practices the twelve ascetic practices.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, in irreversible bodhisattva great beings a miserly mind does not arise,

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ser sna'i sems skye ba med @127b do; ;tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems skye ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ser sna'i sems skye ba med @127b do; ;tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems skye ba med do //
translated: a mind of bad moral discipline does not arise,

original: 'khrug pa'i sems skye ba med do //🔽le lo'i sems skye ba med do //
analyzed: 'khrug pa'i sems skye ba med do // le lo'i sems skye ba med do //
translated: a mind of anger does not arise,🔽a mind of laziness does not arise,

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems skye ba med do //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems skye ba med do //
translated: a mind of distraction does not arise,

original: shes rab 'chal pa'i sems skye ba med do //
analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa'i sems skye ba med do //
translated: a mind of stupidity does not arise,

original: phrag dog gi sems skye ba med do //
analyzed: phrag dog gi sems skye ba med do //
translated: and a mind of jealousy does not arise.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has these aspects, this nature, and these characteristics is a non-regressing Bodhisattva.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blo brtan pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blo brtan pa yin /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, an irreversible Bodhisattva-mahāsattva is one who has a firm mind,

original: blo zab pa yin /
analyzed: blo zab pa yin /
translated: a profound mind,

original: gus par gzhan la chos nyan pa yin /
analyzed: gus par gzhan la chos nyan pa yin /
translated: and who respectfully listens to the Dharma from others.

original: gzhan las chos gang ci thos kyang /
analyzed: gzhan las chos gang ci thos kyang /
translated: Whatever Dharma he hears from others,

original: de thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: de thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par sgrub pa yin /
translated: he practices it all by means of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te /
translated: Whatever worldly activities there are, he practices them all in dependence on the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub cing /
analyzed: chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub cing /
translated: and practices them in accordance with the true nature of dharmas.

original: chos gang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'byor pa de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: chos gang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'byor pa de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not see any dharma that is not included in the dharma-realm.

original: de thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'byor pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: de thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'byor pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba yin te /
translated: They all see the perfection of wisdom as a treasure.

original: rab 'byor / de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that these are the defining characteristics of the irreversible great bodhisattva beings.

original: rab 'byor / de la gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @128a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @128a *//
translated: “Subhūti, if in the presence of the irreversible great bodhisattva beings

original: po'i mdun du bdud sdig to can gyis sems can dmyal pa chen po brgyad mngon du sprul nas /
analyzed: po'i mdun du bdud sdig to can gyis sems can dmyal pa chen po brgyad mngon du sprul nas /
translated: the evil Māra conjures up the eight great hells,

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po de re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po /🔽byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po de re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po /
translated: and in each of those great hells he conjures up many hundreds of bodhisattvas,🔽many thousands of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po /🔽byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po /
translated: many hundreds of thousands of bodhisattvas,🔽many millions of bodhisattvas,🔽many billions of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po /
translated: many trillions of bodhisattvas,🔽and many quintillions of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag mang po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag mang po /
translated: many thousands of ten millions of bodhisattvas,🔽many hundreds of thousands of ten millions of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po /
translated: many hundreds of thousands of ten millions of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po bsreg cing btso ba dang / mi bzad par sdug bsngal ba dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba'i tshor ba myong bar mngon du sprul nas bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po bsreg cing btso ba dang / mi bzad par sdug bsngal ba dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba'i tshor ba myong bar mngon du sprul nas bstan te /
translated: and he manifested and revealed the experience of the unbearable, harsh, and painful feelings of being burned and boiled.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad du /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad du /
translated: He said to that bodhisattva:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa yin te /
translated: “These bodhisattva great beings have been predicted by the Tathāgata to be irreversible,

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes so //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes so //
translated: but they have been reborn in this great hell.

original: khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa ni /
translated: You too have been predicted by the Tathāgata to be irreversible,

original: sems can dmyal ba bar lung bstan te /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba bar lung bstan te /
translated: but you have been predicted to be reborn in the intermediate state of the hells.

original: da dung yang khyad kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di thong zhig dang / khyod sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: da dung yang khyad kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di thong zhig dang / khyod sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Even now, if you give up this thought of awakening, you will not be reborn in the hells.

original: de ltar byas nas khyod mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes zer yang /
analyzed: de ltar byas nas khyod mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes zer yang /
translated: If you do so, you will go to the higher realms.”

original: rab 'byor / @128b gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'khrug cing nem nur med the tshom med na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @128b gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'khrug cing nem nur med the tshom med na /
translated: Subhūti, if the mind of a bodhisattva great being is not disturbed, and is without doubt and without uncertainty,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: then that bodhisattva great being should know that

original: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lung bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lung bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: he has been prophesied by those thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of the past.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te /
translated: That bodhisattva great being is definite

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa'o //
translated: and remains in the irreversible element.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is impossible and there is no chance that

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: It is impossible, it cannot happen, that a bodhisattva great being who has turned back from the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level will be reborn in the hells,🔽in the animal world,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do //
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those tokens, and those signs are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byang du 'ongs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byang du 'ongs te /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, if Māra the wicked one, having come in the guise of a monk to a bodhisattva great being,

original: 'di skad du gang khyod kyis sngon 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
