analyzed: 'di skad du gang khyod kyis sngon 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: were to say, ‘In the past you have trained in the perfection of giving like this,

original: 'di ltar bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: you have trained in the perfection of morality like this,

original: 'di ltar bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify the perfection of patience.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi @129a *//🔽pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi @129a *// pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify the perfection of perseverance.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify the perfection of wisdom.🔽In this way I will purify inner emptiness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify outer emptiness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify inner and outer emptiness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify the emptiness of emptiness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: In this way I will purify great emptiness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽Thus I will purify the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽Thus I will purify the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of all things.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid @129b stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid @129b stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus I will purify the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the emptiness of nonthings.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.🔽I must purify the applications of mindfulness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the right efforts.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the legs of miraculous power.🔽I must purify the faculties.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must purify the powers.

original: di ltar bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: di ltar bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should purify the limbs of awakening.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should purify the noble eightfold path.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should purify the noble truths.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis tshad med pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis tshad med pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should purify the meditative concentrations.🔽I should purify the formless absorptions.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //🔽'di ltar bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar @130a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o // 'di ltar bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar @130a *//
translated: I should purify the immeasurable aspirations.🔽I should purify the liberations.

original: bya'o; ;'di ltar bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o; ;'di ltar bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should purify the aspects of liberation.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should purify emptiness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis mtshan ma med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis mtshan ma med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in signlessness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis smon pa med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis smon pa med pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in wishlessness.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in the superknowledges.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in the meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in the fearlessnesses.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis byams pa chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis byams pa chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I must train in great love.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o; ;'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o; ;'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should train in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should train in the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I should train in the knowledge of all things.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis bla na med @130b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis bla na med @130b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes nas /
translated: I should fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: thos par 'gyur pa de shogs shig /
analyzed: thos par 'gyur pa de shogs shig /
translated: “You should make them hear that.”

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: and all the wholesome roots of the past, future, and present tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas, together with their śrāvaka saṅghas, starting from when they first produced the thought of awakening,🔽up to the abiding of the holy Dharma, and rejoice in all of them.🔽You should confess each of those.

original: dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang so sor shogs shig /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang so sor shogs shig /
translated: You should give them up.

original: thong zhig / gang khyod kyis thos pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin /
analyzed: thong zhig / gang khyod kyis thos pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin /
translated: What you have heard is not the word of the Buddha.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not spoken by the perfectly awakened Buddha.

original: de ni rang bzor byas pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rang bzor byas pa'o //
translated: It is a fabrication.

original: gang ngas bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ste /
analyzed: gang ngas bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ste /
translated: What I have explained is the word of the Buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes zer la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes zer la /
translated: It is spoken by the Tathāgata.’

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug cing nem nur byed la /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug cing nem nur byed la /
translated: If a bodhisattva great being is disturbed and doubts

original: the tshom za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: the tshom za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: If he is doubtful, he should know that he has not been predicted by the former Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mi nges pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mi nges pa yin te /
translated: That bodhisattva is not definite.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: That bodhisattva does not stand in the irreversible element.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug cing /🔽nem nur mi byed /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug cing / nem nur mi byed /
translated: If a bodhisattva great being is not agitated,🔽does not doubt,

original: the tshom mi za la /
analyzed: the tshom mi za la /
translated: and is not doubtful,

original: chos nyid la brten cing mngon par @131a *//
analyzed: chos nyid la brten cing mngon par @131a *//
translated: and if he relies on the intrinsic nature,

original: 'du ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa la brten te /
analyzed: 'du ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa la brten te /
translated: relies on the unconditioned and the unborn,

original: gzhan la yid ches par mi 'gro zhing /
analyzed: gzhan la yid ches par mi 'gro zhing /
translated: does not go to others for confidence,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: does not rely on others for the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: does not rely on others for the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in the perfection of wisdom.🔽They are not led by others in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in outer emptiness.🔽They are not led by others in inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽chen po stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / chen po stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They are not led by others in great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in ultimate emptiness.🔽They are not led by others in conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not led by others in unconditioned emptiness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of what is essentially beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa @131b nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / mi dmigs pa stong pa @131b nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of the non-existence of things.🔽They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of the essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not take their bearings from the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽dbang po rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / dbang po rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not rely on others regarding the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: stobs rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the meditative stabilities.

original: tshad med pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others regarding the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, or the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / ting nge 'dzin rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the clairvoyances.🔽They are not dependent on others for the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzugs kyi sgo rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la @132a *//
analyzed: gzugs kyi sgo rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la @132a *//
translated: They are not dependent on others for the doors of concentration.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽byams pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / byams pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They are not dependent on others for great love.

original: snying rje chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They are not dependent on others for the result of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: They do not rely on others for the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: they do not rely on others for the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /🔽rang byang chub la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / rang byang chub la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
translated: they do not rely on others for the state of a worthy one,🔽they do not rely on others for a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / 'di ltar dper na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / 'di ltar dper na /
translated: and they do not rely on others for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gzhan la yid ches pas mi 'gro zhing chos nyid mngon du gyur pas bdud sdig to can gyis mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gzhan la yid ches pas mi 'gro zhing chos nyid mngon du gyur pas bdud sdig to can gyis mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: For example, Subhūti, an arhat whose defilements have ceased does not go by trusting in others, and the evil Māra cannot overpower him because he has realized reality.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible cannot be defeated by those in the Śrāvaka Vehicle and those in the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin /
translated: they are irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings are definite,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin /
translated: not led by others in the irreversible element.

original: de ni @132b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yid ches pas kyang mi 'gro na /🔽nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te; de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni @132b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yid ches pas kyang mi 'gro na / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te; de ni gnas med do //
translated: “Subhūti, it is impossible that those bodhisattva great beings, having gone forth from the home life into the homeless life in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, would go forth through faith in the śrāvaka vehicle or the pratyekabuddha vehicle,🔽let alone go forth through faith in the tīrthikas.🔽“Subhūti, it is impossible that those bodhisattva great beings, having gone forth from the home life into the homeless life in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, would go forth through faith in the pratyekabuddha vehicle,🔽let alone go forth through faith in the tīrthikas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /🔽de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te / de ni gnas med do //
translated: “Subhūti, it is impossible that those bodhisattva great beings, having gone forth from the home life into the homeless life in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, would go forth through faith in the tīrthikas,

original: bdud sdig to can la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /🔽de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: bdud sdig to can la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /🔽de ni gnas med do //
translated: let alone go forth through faith in Māra the wicked one.

original: mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu ba gzhan dag la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu ba gzhan dag la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How much less would they go on the basis of their trust in non-Buddhists or other wandering mendicants!

original: de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni gnas med do //
translated: That is not possible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des gang la yid ches pas 'gro ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la yid ches pas 'gro ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: It is because they do not see any dharma on the basis of which they would go on the basis of their trust in it.

original: gzugs sam / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs sam / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see form or the suchness of form.

original: tshor ba'am / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'du shes sam /
analyzed: tshor ba'am / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'du shes sam /
translated: They do not see feeling or the suchness of feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'du byed dam /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'du byed dam /
translated: They do not see perception or the suchness of perception.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: They do not see volitional factors or the suchness of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see consciousness or the suchness of consciousness.

original: mig gam / mig gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gam / mig gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the eyes or the suchness of the eyes.

original: rna ba'am / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'am / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the ears or the suchness of the ears.

original: sna'am / sna'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'am / lce'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su @133a *//
analyzed: sna'am / sna'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lce'am / lce'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su @133a *//
translated: They do not see the nose or the suchness of the nose.

original: mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the tongue or the suchness of the tongue.

original: lus sam / lus kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus sam / lus kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the body or the suchness of the body.

original: yid dam / yid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;gzugs sam /
analyzed: yid dam / yid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;gzugs sam /
translated: They do not see the mind or the suchness of the mind.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see forms or the suchness of forms.

original: sgra'am / sgra'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dri'am / dri'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra'am / sgra'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dri'am / dri'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see sounds or the suchness of sounds.🔽They do not see smells or the suchness of smells.

original: ro'am / ro'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ro'am / ro'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see tastes or the suchness of tastes.

original: reg gam / reg gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: reg gam / reg gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see textures or the suchness of textures.

original: chos sam / chos kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: chos sam / chos kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: nor does he see the Dharma or the thusness of the Dharma.🔽He does not see eye consciousness

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or the thusness of eye consciousness.🔽He does not see ear consciousness

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or the thusness of ear consciousness.🔽He does not see nose consciousness

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or the thusness of nose consciousness.🔽He does not see tongue consciousness

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or the thusness of tongue consciousness.🔽He does not see body consciousness

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the thusness of body consciousness.🔽He does not see mind consciousness

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or the thusness of mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the mental consciousness.🔽They do not see contact at the eye,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i @133b de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i @133b de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: or the suchness of contact at the eye.🔽They do not see contact at the ear,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of contact at the ear.🔽They do not see contact at the nose,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: or the suchness of contact at the nose.🔽They do not see contact at the tongue,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: or the suchness of contact at the tongue.🔽They do not see contact at the body,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: or the suchness of contact at the body.🔽They do not see contact at the mind,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of contact at the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: or the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of eye, visible forms, and eye-consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of ear, sounds, and ear-consciousness,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: or the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of ear, sounds, and ear-consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of nose, smells, and nose-consciousness,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: or the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of nose, smells, and nose-consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of tongue, tastes, and tongue-consciousness,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: or the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of tongue, tastes, and tongue-consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of body, tangible objects, and body-consciousness,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: or the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the union of body, tangible objects, and body-consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid @134a *// kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid @134a *// kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the body.🔽They do not see the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the mind.

original: sa'i khams sam; sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽chu'i khams sam /
analyzed: sa'i khams sam; sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chu'i khams sam /
translated: They do not see the earth element or the suchness of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽me'i khams sam /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // me'i khams sam /
translated: They do not see the water element or the suchness of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rlung gi khams sam /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rlung gi khams sam /
translated: They do not see the fire element or the suchness of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽nam mkha'i khams sam /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // nam mkha'i khams sam /
translated: They do not see the wind element or the suchness of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the space element or the suchness of the space element.🔽They do not see the consciousness element or the suchness of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams sam /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;ma rig pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams sam / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;ma rig pa'am /
translated: They do not see the element of consciousness or the suchness of the element of consciousness.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'du byed dam /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'du byed dam /
translated: They do not see ignorance or the suchness of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: They do not see volitional factors or the suchness of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽ming dang gzugs sam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // ming dang gzugs sam /
translated: They do not see consciousness or the suchness of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see name and form or the suchness of name and form.

original: skye mched drug gam; skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skye mched drug gam; skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the six sense fields or the suchness of the six sense fields.

original: reg pa'am / reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: reg pa'am / reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see contact or the suchness of contact.

original: tshor ba'am / tshor ba'i de bzhin @134b nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba'am / tshor ba'i de bzhin @134b nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not feel sensation or the suchness of sensation.

original: sred pa'am / sred pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sred pa'am / sred pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see craving, nor do they see the suchness of craving.

original: len pa'am / len pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽srid pa 'am /
analyzed: len pa'am / len pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // srid pa 'am /
translated: They do not see grasping, nor do they see the suchness of grasping.

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see becoming, nor do they see the suchness of becoming.

original: skye ba'am / skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skye ba'am / skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see birth, nor do they see the suchness of birth.

original: rga shi'am / rga shi'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: rga shi'am / rga shi'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: They do not see old age and death, nor do they see the suchness of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the perfection of generosity, nor do they see the suchness of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: They do not see the perfection of conduct, nor do they see the suchness of the perfection of conduct.🔽They do not see the perfection of patience, nor do they see the suchness of the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the perfection of patience.🔽They do not see the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the perfection of perseverance.🔽They do not see the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the perfection of concentration.🔽They do not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽nang stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not see inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dam /🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag @135a *//🔽par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dam / phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag @135a *// par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see outer emptiness.🔽They do not see the suchness of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see inner and outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam; stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam; stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid dam /🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dam / chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of great extent,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all things,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of non-entities,🔽and the emptiness of essential nature.🔽They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as something to be attained.🔽They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence as something to be attained.🔽

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as something to be attained.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is not to be discarded or the suchness of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of nature or the suchness of the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rang gi @135b mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rang gi @135b mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of all phenomena or the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They do not see the emptiness of its own mark or the suchness of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the emptiness of its own mark.🔽They do not see the emptiness of non-apprehension

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: or the suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They do not see the emptiness of non-things

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: or the suchness of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of essential nature

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: or the suchness of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the applications of mindfulness.🔽They do not see the right efforts,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: or the suchness of the right efforts.🔽They do not see the legs of miraculous power,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dbang po rnams sam /
translated: or the suchness of the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not see the faculties,

original: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // stobs rnams sam /
translated: or the suchness of the faculties.🔽They do not see the powers,

original: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: or the suchness of the powers.🔽They do not see the limbs of awakening,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of the limbs of awakening.🔽They do not see the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: or the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid yang @136a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid yang @136a *//
translated: They do not see the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the noble truths.🔽They do not see the suchness of the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the concentrations.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the immeasurables.🔽They do not see the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the deliverances.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the suchness of the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the stages of meditative absorption.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid dam /
translated: They do not see the suchness of the formless absorptions.🔽They do not see emptiness or the suchness of emptiness.🔽They do not see signlessness or the suchness of signlessness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mtshan ma med pa'am /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtshan ma med pa'am /
translated: They do not see wishlessness or the suchness of wishlessness.🔽They do not see the five eyes or the suchness of the five eyes.🔽They do not see the six superknowledges or the suchness of the six superknowledges.🔽They do not see the four fearlessnesses or the suchness of the four fearlessnesses.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // smon pa med pa'am /
translated: They do not see the four detailed and thorough knowledges or the suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not see the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha or the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see great compassion or the suchness of great compassion.🔽They do not see the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening or the suchness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.🔽They do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas or the suchness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽They do not see the four fearlessnesses or the suchness of the four fearlessnesses.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams sam; mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sam; mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the four detailed and thorough knowledges or the suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not see great compassion or the suchness of great compassion.🔽They do not see the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening or the suchness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @136b ngo; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @136b ngo; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /
translated: They do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas or the suchness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽They do not see the four fearlessnesses or the suchness of the four fearlessnesses.🔽They do not see the four detailed and thorough knowledges or the suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not see great compassion or the suchness of great compassion.🔽They do not see the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening or the suchness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas or the suchness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽They do not see the four

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
translated: the fearlessnesses,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /
translated: or the suchness of the fearlessnesses.🔽the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po'am /🔽byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'am / byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great love,🔽or the suchness of great love.🔽great compassion,

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
translated: or the suchness of great compassion.🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: or the suchness of the fruit of entering the stream;🔽the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: or the suchness of the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth;🔽the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: or the suchness of the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth;🔽the state of a worthy one,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rang byang chub bam /
translated: or the suchness of the state of a worthy one;🔽a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @137a *//
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @137a *//
translated: or the suchness of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam /
analyzed: ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects;🔽awakening,

original: byang chub bam /
analyzed: byang chub bam /
translated: or enlightenment,🔽🔽

original: byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: they do not see the suchness of enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du 'ongs nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du 'ongs nas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, Māra the wicked one, having approached a bodhisattva great being,

original: 'di skad du 'di ni 'khor bar spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'di ni 'khor bar spyod pa yin te /
translated: says, ‘This is the practice in saṃsāra,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: not the practice of a bodhisattva.

original: 'di nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces zer zhing /🔽bdud sdig to can de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la /
analyzed: 'di nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces zer zhing / bdud sdig to can de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la /
translated: You should put an end to suffering right here.’🔽Māra the wicked one

original: lam gyi gzugs brnyan gang 'khor bar spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rnam pas lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston te /
analyzed: lam gyi gzugs brnyan gang 'khor bar spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rnam pas lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston te /
translated: teaches a counterfeit path to the bodhisattva great being, a path that is a counterfeit of the path, a path that is practiced in saṃsāra, a path that is a worldly way.

original: yang na rus par 'du shes pa ston /
analyzed: yang na rus par 'du shes pa ston /
translated: or else he teaches the perception of bones,

original: yang na bsam gtan dang po ston /
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan dang po ston /
translated: or else he teaches the first concentration,

original: yang na bsam gtan gnyis pa ston /
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan gnyis pa ston /
translated: or else he teaches the second concentration,

original: yang na bsam gtan gsum pa ston /
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan gsum pa ston /
translated: or else he teaches the third concentration,

original: yang na bsam gtan bzhi pa ston /🔽yang na byams pa ston /
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan bzhi pa ston / yang na byams pa ston /
translated: or else he teaches the fourth concentration,🔽or else he teaches love,

original: yang na snying rje ston /🔽yang na dga' ba ston /
analyzed: yang na snying rje ston / yang na dga' ba ston /
translated: or else he teaches compassion,🔽or else he teaches joy,

original: yang na btang snyoms ston /
analyzed: yang na btang snyoms ston /
translated: or else he teaches equanimity,

original: yang na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ston /
analyzed: yang na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ston /
translated: or else he teaches the sphere of infinite space,

original: yang na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ston /
analyzed: yang na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ston /
translated: or else he teaches the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: yang na @137b cung zad med pa'i skye mched ston /
analyzed: yang na @137b cung zad med pa'i skye mched ston /
translated: or else he teaches the sphere of nothingness,

original: yang na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ston cing /
analyzed: yang na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ston cing /
translated: or else he teaches the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception,

original: tshe dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: and he says to the venerable one,🔽“Venerable one,

original: lam dang nan tan gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lam dang nan tan ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: lam dang nan tan gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lam dang nan tan ni 'di yin no //
translated: “This is the path and this is the practice by which one attains the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and the fruit of worthiness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: Venerable one,

original: lam dang nan tan 'dis 'di nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyung zhig dang / phyin chad 'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam dang nan tan 'dis 'di nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyung zhig dang / phyin chad 'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: by this path and this practice, you will put an end to suffering right here and now, and you will not experience the suffering of wandering in cyclic existence in the future.

original: kye ma khyod kyi lus 'di nyid du mngon par ma grub na /
analyzed: kye ma khyod kyi lus 'di nyid du mngon par ma grub na /
translated: Alas, if this very body of yours is not established,

original: lus gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su gzung bar sems zhes zer yang /
analyzed: lus gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su gzung bar sems zhes zer yang /
translated: how could you think of taking up another body?”

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'khrug mi g-yo zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'khrug mi g-yo zhing /
translated: Subhūti, if the mind of a bodhisattva great being is not disturbed or shaken,

original: gong du'ang 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: gong du'ang 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: and if he thinks like this:

original: 'di ltar bdag la lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag la lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ni /
translated: “In this way, the monk who teaches me the reflected form of the path

original: dge slong 'di bdag la phan 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'di bdag la phan 'dogs pa ste /
translated: is helping me.

original: lam gyi gzugs brnyan des ni /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: lam gyi gzugs brnyan des ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
translated: But through that reflected form of the path,🔽I will not manifest the fruit of entering the stream,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not manifest the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not manifest the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not manifest the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rang byang chub mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not manifest individual enlightenment,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam ste /🔽de las @138a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam ste / de las @138a *//
translated: and I will not manifest unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: kyang gong du gang bdag la de ltar chags pa ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: kyang gong du gang bdag la de ltar chags pa ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa yin gyi /
translated: “Moreover, I should think, ‘The monk who teaches me this is helping me.

original: bdag gis chags pa de dag shes par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis chags pa de dag shes par bya ste /
translated: I should understand those attachments.

original: theg pa gsum po kun la bslab par bya'o zhes dga' ba skye la /
analyzed: theg pa gsum po kun la bslab par bya'o zhes dga' ba skye la /
translated: and he will think, “I must train in all three vehicles.”

original: bdud sdig to can des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dga' bar gyur par shes nas /
analyzed: bdud sdig to can des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dga' bar gyur par shes nas /
translated: And when Māra, the evil one, realizes that the bodhisattva great being is delighted,

original: de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /
analyzed: de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /
translated: he will say to him, ‘Noble son, many bodhisattva great beings have served the blessed buddhas, as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River, with robes, alms-food, bedding, seats, remedies for exhaustion, and medicinal herbs.
