original: yo byad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /
analyzed: yo byad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /
translated: They have completed the perfection of generosity in the presence of the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas, as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: practicing the perfection of meditative stability, practicing the perfection of wisdom, practicing inner emptiness, practicing outer emptiness, practicing inner and outer emptiness,🔽practicing the emptiness of emptiness, practicing the emptiness of great immensity, practicing the emptiness of ultimate reality, practicing the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, practicing the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: practicing the emptiness of beyond extremes, practicing the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, practicing the emptiness of nonrepudiation, practicing the emptiness of inherent natures,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: It is to practice the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities. It is to practice the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / @139a *//
analyzed: dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / @139a *//
translated: and the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: to practice the powers, to practice the limbs of awakening, to practice the noble eightfold path, to practice the truths of the noble ones, to practice the concentrations, to practice the immeasurables,🔽to practice the formless absorptions, to practice the eight deliverances, to practice the nine serial absorptions, to practice the emptiness, signlessness, and

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: wishlessness that are doors to liberation, to practice the ten tathāgata powers, to practice the four fearlessnesses, to practice the four detailed and thorough knowledges, to practice the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, to practice the thirty-two major marks of a great person, and to practice the eighty minor marks.

original: smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /
translated: They practice the gateways of mnemonic incantation, the ten powers of the thus-gone ones, the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, the understanding of all phenomena,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: the understanding of the aspects of the path, and the understanding of all topics.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par bgyi zhes /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par bgyi zhes /
translated: When they practice in this way, they should abide by the vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi don du kun dris shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi don du kun dris shing /
translated: They should ask about the meaning of this very vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: yongs su zhus pa rnams la bstan par 'dod dam /
analyzed: yongs su zhus pa rnams la bstan par 'dod dam /
translated: “Do you want to be taught what you have asked about?”

original: de @139b ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang bshad pa la de bzhin du gnas te /
analyzed: de @139b ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang bshad pa la de bzhin du gnas te /
translated: “Those who abide in the teachings of those lord buddhas

original: de bzhin du brtson par byas kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du brtson par byas kyang /
translated: and make efforts in that way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te /
translated: have not attained manifestly perfect buddhahood with regard to unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: de ltar gdams pa dang / de ltar bstan pa dang / de ltar gnas pa dang / de ltar slob slob pa rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na /
analyzed: de ltar gdams pa dang / de ltar bstan pa dang / de ltar gnas pa dang / de ltar slob slob pa rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na /
translated: “Those who have been instructed in that way, who have been taught in that way, who have abided in that way, and who have trained in that way have not attained omniscience.

original: khyod kyis lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur re skan zhes brjod de /
analyzed: khyod kyis lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur re skan zhes brjod de /
translated: So how could you possibly attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment?”

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings are spoken to in that way,

original: snying brnyan bcug kyang de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: snying brnyan bcug kyang de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur la /
translated: their minds do not change.

original: mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: they will not be afraid, terrified, or scared.

original: gong du'ang dge slong 'di ni de ltar bdag la chags pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gong du'ang dge slong 'di ni de ltar bdag la chags pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, they will think, ‘This monk is teaching me to be attached to a self, because of which I will not attain the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not attain the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur / dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not attain the result of non-returner,🔽I will not attain the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub kyang thob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyang thob par mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not attain a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur /
translated: I will not attain the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur ba'i chags pa ston pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur ba'i chags pa ston pa ni /
translated: and I will not attain the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: bdag la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes dga' ba skyes pas /🔽bdud sdig to can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @140a *//
analyzed: bdag la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes dga' ba skyes pas / bdud sdig to can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @140a *//
translated: They will be pleased, thinking, ‘This is helping me.’🔽Then Māra the wicked one,

original: de'i sems la zhum pa med par rig nas /
analyzed: de'i sems la zhum pa med par rig nas /
translated: knowing that the mind of that bodhisattva great being is not downcast,

original: sa'i phyogs de nyid du dge slong mang po mngon par sprul te /
analyzed: sa'i phyogs de nyid du dge slong mang po mngon par sprul te /
translated: and in that very place he conjures up many monks,

original: dge slong 'di dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug 'jug pa sha stag ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'di dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug 'jug pa sha stag ste /
translated: saying, ‘All these monks have entered into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par gyur na /
translated: and they have reached the level of a worthy one.

original: khyod ltas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur re skan zhes zer yang /
analyzed: khyod ltas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur re skan zhes zer yang /
translated: How could you attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?’

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste /
translated: If that bodhisattva great being thinks,

original: 'di ni bdud sdig to can te /
analyzed: 'di ni bdud sdig to can te /
translated: ‘This is the evil Māra,🔽who is showing a counterfeit path,’

original: lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: that bodhisattva great being,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing /
translated: will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and will not fall to the śrāvaka level🔽or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la /
translated: and they do not fall to the level of a pratyekabuddha,

original: de las kyang gong du 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: de las kyang gong du 'di snyam ste /
translated: and they think, ‘Even higher than that,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: bodhisattva great beings

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
translated: practicing the perfection of giving, practicing the perfection of morality, practicing the perfection of patience, practicing the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar spyod @140b pa ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar spyod @140b pa ni /
translated: practicing the perfection of concentration, practicing the perfection of wisdom, up to practicing the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i gnas med /🔽skabs med de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i gnas med / skabs med de /
translated: there is no possibility, there is no chance, that they will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽That is not possible.

original: de ni gnas ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin no snyam na /
translated: That is not the case.’

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are like this,

original: 'di snyam du gal te de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de ltar bslabs la spyod pa de dang ma bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yid la byed pa 'di dag gis spyod pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de ltar bslabs la spyod pa de dang ma bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yid la byed pa 'di dag gis spyod pa de ni /
translated: they think, ‘If I train as the Tathāgata has taught and practice without being separated from that practice, and if I practice with these attentions associated with the perfections,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: I will not decline from the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: I will not decline from the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: I will not decline from the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams /🔽nang stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams / nang stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the perfection of wisdom,🔽they do not regress from inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi @141a *//🔽nyams; 'dus byas stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi @141a *// nyams; 'dus byas stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from ultimate emptiness,🔽they do not regress from conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from unconditioned emptiness,🔽they do not regress from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the emptiness of beginning and end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽They do not regress from the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams; chos thams cad stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams; chos thams cad stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽They do not regress from the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the emptiness of non-things.🔽They do not regress from the emptiness of essence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the emptiness of the essence of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: yang dag par spong pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /🔽dbang po rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams / dbang po rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not regress from the faculties.

original: stobs rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: stobs rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: They do not regress from the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the aspects of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the immeasurables,

original: gzugs @141b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: gzugs @141b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to deliverance,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the four assurances,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las yongs su mi nyams /🔽byams pa chen po las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las yongs su mi nyams / byams pa chen po las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the four kinds of exact knowledge,🔽they do not regress from great loving kindness,

original: snying rje chen po las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the knowledge of all aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams /
translated: they do not regress from the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams so snyam la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams so snyam la /
translated: and they do not regress from the knowledge of all things as they are and in every aspect.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sus bdud kyi las su rig pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sus bdud kyi las su rig pa de ni /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who think, ‘Whoever knows the deeds of Māra

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su mi nyams so snyam na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su mi nyams so snyam na /
translated: will not regress from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,’

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @142a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @142a *//
translated: Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, who is endowed with these attributes, these tokens, and these signs, should be known as irreversible from full enlightenment.

original: dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, you should know that a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has these aspects, this nature, and these characteristics is a non-regressing Bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Buddha spoke thus, and the Venerable Subhuti addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: World-Honored One,🔽why is it called non-regressing for a non-regressing Bodhisattva-mahāsattva?

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci las slar ldog pa'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba lags /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci las slar ldog pa'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba lags /
translated: What does he regress from?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Buddha said:

original: rab 'byor / de ni gzugs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni gzugs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go //
translated: Subhuti, he regresses from the perception of form,

original: tshor ba'i 'dus shes las phyir ldog go /🔽'du shes kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'dus shes las phyir ldog go / 'du shes kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: regresses from the perception of sensation,🔽regresses from the perception of perception,

original: 'du byed kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: regresses from the perception of volition,

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: regresses from the perception of consciousness,

original: khams kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: khams kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the elements.

original: skye mched kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: skye mched kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the sense sources.

original: 'dod chags kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽zhe sdang gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go / zhe sdang gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of desire.🔽They turn away from the perception of anger.

original: gti mug gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: gti mug gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of ignorance.

original: lta ba'i rnam pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the views.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the perfections.

original: stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of emptiness.🔽They turn away from the perception of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽dbang po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go / dbang po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the legs of miraculous power.🔽They turn away from the perception of the faculties.

original: stobs kyi 'du shes las @142b phyir ldog go /
analyzed: stobs kyi 'du shes las @142b phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn away from the perception of the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽tshad med pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go / tshad med pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the dhyānas.🔽They turn back from the perception of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: They turn back from the perception of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of fearlessness;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽byams pa chen po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go / byams pa chen po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of the detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽they turn away from the notion of great love;

original: snying rje chen po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of the distinct attributes of a Buddha;🔽they turn away from the notion of the result of stream-enterer;

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras @143a *//
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras @143a *//
translated: they turn away from the notion of the result of once-returner;

original: bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of the result of non-returner;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /🔽rang byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go / rang byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of the state of a worthy one;🔽they turn away from the notion of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of complete buddhahood;

original: nyan thos kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the notion of a śrāvaka;

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the perception of pratyekabuddhas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the perception of bodhisattvas;

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go /
translated: they turn away from the perception of buddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings who do not turn back enter into the maturity of the bodhisattvas because all phenomena are empty of their own marks.

original: des chos rdul tsam yang dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: des chos rdul tsam yang dmigs pa med do //
translated: They do not apprehend even the minutest phenomenon.

original: dmigs pa med pas mngon par 'du mi byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pas mngon par 'du mi byed do //
translated: Since they do not apprehend anything, they do not form mental constructs.

original: mngon par 'du mi byed pas skye ba med de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed pas skye ba med de /
translated: Since they do not form mental constructs, they are not born.

original: de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya ste /
translated: That is called the acceptance of nonarising of bodhisattva great beings who do not turn back.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: “Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.

original: le'u so dgu pa'o ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: le'u so dgu pa'o //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines, Chapter 39

original: bam po nyis brgya so bdun pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya so bdun pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @143b chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ong ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @143b chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ong ste /
translated: Subhūti, moreover, Māra the wicked one comes near to bodhisattva great beings and,

original: mos pa zlog cing /
analyzed: mos pa zlog cing /
translated: turning them away from aspiration,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
translated: says, ‘This knowledge of all aspects is like space,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o /
translated: the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, empty of its own marks.

original: chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
translated: These dharmas are like space,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o //
translated: They are empty of their own characteristics.

original: de ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
translated: Thus, all phenomena are like space,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: having the non-entityness of an intrinsic nature,🔽and are empty of their own characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang mi dmigs te /
translated: One does not apprehend any phenomenon at all that is to be awakened into perfect buddhahood, by which one is awakened into perfect buddhahood, or that is to be awakened into perfect buddhahood.

original: chos 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: chos 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: All these phenomena are like space, having the non-entityness of an intrinsic nature,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas 'di lta ste /
translated: and are empty of their own characteristics.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, the thought, ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,’

original: khyod nyon mongs la don med par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: khyod nyon mongs la don med par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: is meaningless for you,

original: 'di ni bdud kyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bdud kyis bstan pa'o //
translated: and this is taught by Māra.

original: 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the teaching of the Perfectly Awakened One.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family,

original: yid la byed pa de dag thong la /
analyzed: yid la byed pa de dag thong la /
translated: give up those thoughts,

original: khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa med par ma spyod cig /
analyzed: khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa med par ma spyod cig /
translated: and do not engage in what is harmful and useless for a long time.

original: sdug bsngal dang / log par ltung ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang / log par ltung ngo zhes zer na /
translated: You will suffer and fall into a bad rebirth.”

original: de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshig de dag thos nas /
analyzed: de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshig de dag thos nas /
translated: When a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family hears those words,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya @144a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya @144a *//
translated: they should investigate as follows:

original: ste; de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa de ni bdud kyi las te /
analyzed: ste; de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa de ni bdud kyi las te /
translated: “The fact that I am turning away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is the work of Māra.

original: chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: All phenomena are like space, and have the nature of being unreal;

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi /
translated: they are empty of their own characteristics.

original: de dag sems can rnams kyis ma shes /
analyzed: de dag sems can rnams kyis ma shes /
translated: But sentient beings do not know that,

original: ma mthong / khong du ma chud kyi /
analyzed: ma mthong / khong du ma chud kyi /
translated: do not see it, and do not understand it.

original: de'i phyir bdag gis nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i go cha bgos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag gis nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i go cha bgos te /
translated: Therefore, I will don the armor of the sky-like nature of non-entity, empty of intrinsic characteristics.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la /
translated: Having fully awakened to omniscience,

original: sems can thams cad la 'byung ba'i chos bstan to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la 'byung ba'i chos bstan to //
translated: I will teach the Dharma of emergence to all sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish sentient beings in the fruit of stream-entry.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in the fruit of once-returning. I will establish them in the fruit of non-returning.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu dgod par bya'o //🔽rang byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu dgod par bya'o // rang byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish them in arhatship.🔽I will establish them in individual enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed cing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed cing /
translated: I will establish them in unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: In this regard, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, beginning from the first generation of the mind,🔽

original: chos de dag thos nas sems brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: chos de dag thos nas sems brtan par bya'o //
translated: There, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, having heard those dharmas, should stabilize his mind.

original: sems mi g-yo bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems mi g-yo bar bya'o //
translated: He should not waver.

original: sems mi 'phrogs par bya'o //
analyzed: sems mi 'phrogs par bya'o //
translated: He should not be carried away.

original: de sems brtan pa dang / sems mi g-yo ba dang / sems mi 'phrogs pa de dang ldan pas @144b pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod na /
analyzed: de sems brtan pa dang / sems mi g-yo ba dang / sems mi 'phrogs pa de dang ldan pas @144b pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod na /
translated: Endowed with that stable mind, that unwavering mind, that uncarried-away mind, when he practices the six perfections,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: ci lags bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: ci lags bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi'am /
analyzed: slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi'am /
translated: is it the irreversible bodhisattva mahāsattva who is called ‘irreversible,’

original: 'on tam slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi /
analyzed: 'on tam slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi /
translated: or is it the reversible bodhisattva who is called ‘irreversible’?🔽The Lord said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva who does not turn away from the irreversible stage is called one who turns away.

original: phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: A Bodhisattva who turns away from the irreversible stage is called one who does not turn away.🔽The Lord: A Bodhisattva who turns away from the level of Disciple or Pratyekabuddha is called one who turns away.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: A Bodhisattva who does not turn away from the level of Disciple or Pratyekabuddha is called one who does not turn away.

original: ci'i slad du slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi /
analyzed: ci'i slad du slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi /
translated: Subhuti : Why is a Bodhisattva who does not turn away from the irreversible stage called one who turns away?

original: ci'i slad du slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ci'i slad du slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: And why is a Bodhisattva who turns away from the irreversible stage called one who does not turn away?

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir ldog pa de ni /🔽rab 'byor / phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir ldog pa de ni / rab 'byor / phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
translated: The Lord: A Bodhisattva who turns away from the level of Disciple or Pratyekabuddha is called one who turns away.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: A Bodhisattva who does not turn away from the level of Disciple or Pratyekabuddha is called one who does not turn away.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
translated: Subhuti : Why is a Bodhisattva who turns away from the level of Disciple or Pratyekabuddha called one who turns away?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir mi ldog pa de ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir mi ldog pa de ni /
translated: “Subhūti, that is the irreversible level of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
translated: Subhūti, that is the irreversible bodhisattva great being.

original: phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma @145a *//
analyzed: phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o // rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma @145a *//
translated: That is called ‘irreversible.’

original: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya ste /
translated: “Subhūti, you should know the defining characteristics of the irreversible bodhisattva great beings by those aspects, those modes, and those signs.

original: rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus so //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na /
analyzed: rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus so // rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na /
translated: Māra the wicked one cannot stop those bodhisattva great beings endowed with those aspects, those modes, and those signs from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, if the irreversible bodhisattva great beings want to, they enter the first concentration.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They enter the second concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go /🔽byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go / byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the fourth concentration.🔽He enters into loving kindness.

original: snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into compassion.

original: dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into joy.

original: btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the sphere of infinite space.🔽He enters into the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go ;cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go ;cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the sphere of nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the absorption of cessation.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, if irreversible bodhisattva great beings want to,🔽they enter into the four applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag @145b par spong ba bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: yang dag @145b par spong ba bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They enter into the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go /🔽dbang po lnga la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go / dbang po lnga la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They become absorbed in the four bases of supernatural powers.🔽They become absorbed in the five powers.

original: stobs lnga la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: stobs lnga la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They become absorbed in the five strengths.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They become absorbed in the seven factors of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They become absorbed in the noble eightfold path.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They become absorbed in the meditative stabilities of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: They accomplish the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: de bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gis 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'dris par byed /
analyzed: de bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gis 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'dris par byed /
translated: “They become familiar with the meditative absorption of cessation through those four concentrations, four limitless ones, and four formless absorptions.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi goms par byed /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi goms par byed /
translated: They cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi goms par byed /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi goms par byed /
translated: They cultivate the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi goms par byed /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi goms par byed /
translated: They cultivate the four bases of supernatural power.

original: dbang po lnga goms par byed /
analyzed: dbang po lnga goms par byed /
translated: They cultivate the five powers.

original: stobs lnga goms par byed /
analyzed: stobs lnga goms par byed /
translated: He cultivates the five strengths.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun goms par byed /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun goms par byed /
translated: He cultivates the seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa goms par byed /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa goms par byed /
translated: He cultivates the eightfold noble path.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: He enters the emptiness, signless, and wishless meditative stabilizations,

original: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: but does not appropriate the fruits of the meditative stabilizations.

original: tshad med pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not appropriate the fruits of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not appropriate the fruits of the formless absorptions.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i @146a *//
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to // rgyun du zhugs pa'i @146a *//
translated: He does not appropriate the fruits of the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not appropriate the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not appropriate the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.🔽He does not appropriate the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not appropriate the fruit of arhatship.

original: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
translated: He does not attain individual enlightenment.

original: de 'dod na /
analyzed: de 'dod na /
translated: If he wishes,

original: ched du bsam shing lus yongs su 'dzin te /
analyzed: ched du bsam shing lus yongs su 'dzin te /
translated: he deliberately takes up a body.

original: lus gang gis sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'gyur pa de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: lus gang gis sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'gyur pa de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He takes up a body with which he can benefit sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have those attributes, those modes, and those signs are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub yid la byed pa dang ldan te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub yid la byed pa dang ldan te /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, irreversible bodhisattva great beings are attentive to awakening.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing gzugs lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing gzugs lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They are not intent on form,

original: mtshan ma lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: not intent on signs,

original: lus lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: lus lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: not intent on a body,

original: sbyin pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: not intent on generosity,

original: tshul khrims lhur len pa ma yin /🔽bzod pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims lhur len pa ma yin / bzod pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: not intent on morality,🔽not intent on patience,

original: brtson 'grus lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: not intent on perseverance,

original: bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: not intent on concentration,

original: shes rab lhur len pa ma yin /🔽nang stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab lhur len pa ma yin / nang stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on wisdom.🔽They do not focus on inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa @146b nyid lhur len pa ma yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa @146b nyid lhur len pa ma yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on ultimate emptiness.🔽They do not focus on conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on unconditioned emptiness.🔽They do not focus on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.🔽They do not focus on the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the emptiness of nonthings.🔽They do not take delight in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lhur len pa ma yin /🔽dbang po lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lhur len pa ma yin / dbang po lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not take delight in the faculties.

original: stobs lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: stobs lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not take delight in the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the nine serial absorptions.🔽They do not focus on emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med @147a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med @147a *//
translated: signlessness,

original: pa dang / smon pa med pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: pa dang / smon pa med pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: or wishlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on meditative stabilization.

original: gzungs kyi sgo lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin /🔽byams pa chen po lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin / byams pa chen po lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not focus on great love.

original: snying rje chen po lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lhur len pa ma yin /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lhur len pa ma yin / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They do not focus on the result of stream enterer.🔽They do not focus on the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: They do not focus on the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: they are not intent on the state of an arhat,

original: rang byang chub lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang byang chub lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: they are not intent on a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: they are not intent on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: they are not intent on purifying a buddhafield,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: they are not intent on bringing beings to maturity,

original: sangs rgyas blta ba lhur len pa ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas blta ba lhur len pa ma yin /
translated: they are not intent on seeing the Buddha,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lhur len pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lhur len pa ma yin no //
translated: and they are not intent on producing wholesome roots.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir /
translated: If you ask why,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la lhur blang ba bskyed pa dang / gang gis bskyed pa dang / gang la bskyed par bya ba'i chos de lta bu @147b gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la lhur blang ba bskyed pa dang / gang gis bskyed pa dang / gang la bskyed par bya ba'i chos de lta bu @147b gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because great bodhisattva beings do not consider any phenomenon at all, in terms of which they might generate intent, by whom they might generate it, or on which they might generate it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
translated: In this way, all phenomena are like space,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: having the nature of non-entityness,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o //
translated: and are empty of their own marks.

original: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yid la bya ba de dang ldan pas spyod lam bzhir 'gro'am /🔽'ong na'ang nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'gro; nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'ong /
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yid la bya ba de dang ldan pas spyod lam bzhir 'gro'am / 'ong na'ang nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'gro; nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'ong /
translated: “Subhūti, when irreversible bodhisattva great beings who have this attention go out or come in for the four modes of deportment, they do not go with a confused mind,🔽they do not come with a confused mind,🔽they do not stay with a confused mind,

original: nor pa'i sems kyis mi sdod /🔽nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'chag /🔽nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'dug /
analyzed: nor pa'i sems kyis mi sdod / nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'chag / nor pa'i sems kyis mi 'dug /
translated: they do not walk with a confused mind,🔽they do not sit with a confused mind,

original: nor pa'i sems kyis mi nyal te /🔽de dran bzhin du 'gro'o //🔽dran bzhin du 'ong ngo //
analyzed: nor pa'i sems kyis mi nyal te / de dran bzhin du 'gro'o // dran bzhin du 'ong ngo //
translated: and they do not lie down with a confused mind.🔽They go with mindfulness.🔽They come with mindfulness.

original: dran bzhin du 'chag go /🔽dran bzhin du sdod do //🔽dran bzhin du 'dug go /
analyzed: dran bzhin du 'chag go / dran bzhin du sdod do // dran bzhin du 'dug go /
translated: They walk with mindfulness.🔽They stay with mindfulness.🔽They sit with mindfulness.

original: dran bzhin du nyal lo //
analyzed: dran bzhin du nyal lo //
translated: They lie down with mindfulness.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has these aspects, this nature, and these signs should be known as irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni khyim na gnas kyang thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar len to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni khyim na gnas kyang thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar len to //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, if an irreversible Bodhisattva-mahāsattva lives in a household, he uses skillful means to take up the five sense pleasures in order to ripen beings.

original: de sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /🔽zas 'dod pa la zas /🔽skom 'dod pa la skom /
analyzed: de sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste / zas 'dod pa la zas / skom 'dod pa la skom /
translated: He gives gifts to beings.🔽To those who want food, he gives food.

original: bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa /🔽gos 'dod pa la gos /
analyzed: bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa / gos 'dod pa la gos /
translated: To those who want drink, he gives drink.🔽To those who want vehicles, he gives vehicles.🔽To those who want clothing, he gives clothing.

original: mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha /🔽me tog 'dod pa la me tog /
